thesisdown 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

thesisdown 0.1.0

  • Fixed issue ((#86)[https://github.com/ismayc/thesisdown/issues/86]) with references not showing in Gitbook version
  • Added support for customizing of thesisdown::gitbook ((#84)[https://github.com/ismayc/thesisdown/pull/84])
  • Added hex sticker (1 and 2)
  • Converted http to https throughout Rmd files
  • Reduced flights.csv included data to prepare for sending to CRAN
  • Created {pkgdown} site

thesisdown 0.0.2

  • Changed default filename (in directions) to be index instead of skeleton to match with gitbook requirements
  • Added preliminary files 00--prelim.Rmd and changed abstract.Rmd to 00-abstract.Rmd to match with renaming of files so that index.Rmd always comes last alphabetically
  • Removed _book and _bookdown_files directories since they are stored at https://github.com/ismayc/thesisdown_book/tree/gh-pages

thesisdown 0.0.1

  • Initial release
  • PDF version working

Contents

Developed by Chester Ismay, Nick Solomon.

Site built with pkgdown 1.5.1.
